    • Prehistoric Hunters

    Run for it! The mighty T-Rex is on the loose! Rule the prehistoric world with his opening mouth full of teeth, powerful moving legs and a long tail! Rebuild it into a flying pterodactyl with moving wings or a poseable brachiosaurus!
